abstract: Fallen chip superstar Transmeta is looking for a buyer, leaving behind an industry now obsessed with saving power.
snippet: Fallen chip superstar Transmeta is looking for a buyer, leaving behind an industry now obsessed with saving power.
lead_paragraph: On the grand list of over-hyped, underperforming chip start-ups, Transmeta ranks pretty darn high. The company never came close to reaching the expectations of its investors who hoped to give giant Intel some real competition in the low-power chip market.

headline.main: Batteries Near Dead, Transmeta Is Up for Sale
